name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

name: Improvised Seaforium Pacemaker

spells.description:
Equip: Repurpose a Seaforium charge to give your heart a kick, causing your first ability every 60 sec to trigger Explosive Adrenaline, granting 3,303 Critical Strike for 15 sec.

While exploding, Critical Strikes cause you to blow up again, extending this duration by 1 sec, up to 15 times.

description: It's just crazy enough to work...

spells.description: Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 6,770 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 178 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Taking damage greater than 25% of your health grants you 2,449 Avoidance and increases healing taken by 10% for 10 sec. This effect may only occur every 90 sec.

Falling damage reduced.
Equip: Your damaging spells and abilities have a chance to deal 117,913 damage to your target. The magic school chosen is based upon your selection of socketed Khaz Algar gems.
Equip: Your attacks have a very high chance to contaminate your target with industrial runoff up to 25 times, dealing 1,117 Shadow damage per stack every 3 sec until their demise.
Use: Plant your Theramore banner. (3 Min Cooldown)
